Title: Relates to educating nursing home residents about the role of legal counsel in applying for Medicaid benefits
Summary: Relates to educating nursing home residents about the role of legal counsel in applying for Medicaid benefits; requires operators of residential health care facilities to display and provide residents with a notice upon admission regarding such resident's right to hire an attorney to assist with a Medicaid application.
LawCode: Add ยง2803-z, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to educating nursing home residents about the role of legal counsel in applying for Medicaid benefits
